body.p: includes wizards that enable you to complete tasks easily. Examples of such tasks are when you create a new virtual machine or use the cloud integration features of .
To display a help topic for the wizard, click the Help button.
Some wizards can be displayed in either of the following modes:

li.p: Guided mode. This is the default display mode. Wizards are shown in the conventional manner, using a series of pages with descriptions to guide the user through the steps for a task.
Expert mode. This display mode is designed for more advanced users of . All settings are displayed on a single page, enabling quicker completion of tasks.

body.p: Click the button at the bottom of the wizard window to switch between Guided mode and Expert mode.
